tool_description:
Download YouTube video or YT music in highest mp3 audio quality.
Best audio quality: 320Kbps, 128Kbps, 192Kbps, 256Kbps & 64Kbps.
(No ads, no wild redirects, only mp3 files)
Updated: 31 May 2023. (Now supports Youtu.be links)
name: YouTube mp3 Download (Highest Quality)
title: YouTube mp3 Download (Highest Quality)

api_list.name: Download YouTube to Mp3
api_list.description: Get download links in: 320Kbps, 256Kbps, 192, 128 & 64Kbps. (Specify the quality in the field)

required_parameters.name: quality
required_parameters.description:
Select the audio quality of the output mp3. Allowed values are:
320
192
256
128
64
